Sat, 24th April

DevSpeak #29 | Two different perspectives at the table: a conversation about FP and OOP

Diego Fernandes, Dani Leão, Laura Beatris and Rafael Camarda15 Jan 2101:10:37

Diego and Dani welcomed Laura Beatris and Rafael Camarda to the DevSpeak table to talk about functional programming and object-oriented programming.

Market analysis, concepts in practice and challenges in adopting any development method. All this in a dynamic conversation relevant to our audience.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we bring together technology professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

The DevSpeak is an original Rocketseat podcast.

Audio in Brazilian Portuguese
